data.actual_result: It appears enormous and can only display max 2 letters before cutting off with "..."
data.expected_result: The text inside the default icon should be small enough so it can display 4-5 letters fine
data.short_description: The text in the server default icon is huge in Overview screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server and give it a name with a lot of words  - Go to Server settings > Overview
